Package simu.model

Class Order

java.lang.Object
simu.model.Order
@Entity public class Order extends Object
The Order class represents a customer's order in the simulation. It includes details about the pizza, drink, and associated revenue and expenses. Each order is tied to a customer and contains a unique ID.

  • Constructor Details

    • Order

      public Order(PizzaNames pizzaType, PizzaSizes pizzaSize, DrinkNames drinkType, AbstractCustomer c)
      Constructs an Order object with the specified pizza, drink, and customer details. The order revenue and expenses are calculated based on the prices of the items.
      Parameters:
      pizzaType - The type of pizza ordered.
      pizzaSize - The size of the pizza ordered.
      drinkType - The type of drink ordered.
      c - The customer who placed the order.
